name: Slime Rise
description:
Slime Rise

Made for Ludum Dare 50

Build houses to acquire scaffolding and escape the rising slime. Save the others so that they might join your numbers.

Controls

Left-click  to build houses,  right-click to build scaffolding. W and S to pan up and down. 

Tools

  • Godot
  • Aseprite
  • bfxr
  • Ardour
